programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Angela, an American tour guide in Rome, agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman named Oliver about the heart of Rome at Christmas.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia takes action when a depressed, gun-toting Santa Claus threatens to ruin Christmas for her and her housemates.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's daughter and Dorothy's son visit their mothers at the same time.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, Blanche and Dorothy take a vacation at a resort that doesn't live up to its reputation.

programme.desc: While Dorothy is laid off from teaching, she finds work at the same museum where Blanche goes to work.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After observing their constant bickering in the office, Reba and Van's boss insists they see the company's occupational therapist.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba must care for Brock, who has kidney stones while Barbra Jean is away; Cheyenne helps at the homeless shelter.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba does not approve of Barbra Jean's method of disciplining Henry; Brock and Van are mistaken for a gay couple when they go to a day spa.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After Brock and Barbra Jean get audited, Brock informs Reba that the IRS is going to audit the last five years of their marriage.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is troubled by the realization that his new relationship is based on physical attraction.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles tries to ask Daphne out on a date; Frasier is hooked on a TV show.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz meets her baby's father's folks and is surprised to recognize a family trait; Frasier's gift for Daphne.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz has her baby; Frasier and Niles plan a party in hopes of heating up their love lives.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Frasier stands on a ledge to try and win Lilith back after she admits to an affair.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca makes Thanksgiving dinner for everyone; Woody catches Kelly's dad (Richard Doyle) in a compromising position.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Embarrassed Brock believes the only way he can pay off his back taxes is to sell his house and move to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Morgan returns to Houston with the intention of resuming his romance with Reba, despite the fact that he is still married.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba advises Van to treat Cheyenne as an equal in the family budget, which prompts him to give her an allowance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: In an effort to save Brock and Barbra Jean from losing their home, Reba and Van buy their house and rent it out to them.

programme.title: Destination Wedding
programme.desc: Ellie has been painstakingly planning her sister Mandy's destination wedding for a very long time. When Mandy and her fiance don't show up, Ellie and her ex-boyfriend find themselves reconnecting while frantically trying to prevent a disaster.

programme.title: The Baker's Son
programme.desc: Matt's passion transforms his bread from bland to brilliant. However, when the bread loses its magic, the island locals panic and turn to Annie -- Matt's childhood friend and true love -- for help.

programme.title: The Presence of Love
programme.desc: An adjunct professor bonds with a single father after traveling to England to visit the farm where her late mother grew up.

programme.title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
programme.desc: A local chocolatier is rumored to have the secret recipe to finding true love on Valentine's Day, drawing in a television reporter to investigate.

programme.title: Villa Amore
programme.desc: Liara goes to Italy and impulsively buys the villa where her parents met. She soon learns she is in way over her head and must ask a lawyer-turned-handyman to help her renovate.

programme.title: The Magic of Lemon Drops
programme.desc: When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had made different choices and lived those unfulfilled dreams.

programme.title: Providence Falls
programme.desc: Cora, a new police detective, is partnered with visiting detective Liam on her first case; little does she know that Liam is her reincarnated love who's here to change her fate.

programme.title: It Was Always You
programme.desc: A woman's engagement plans get thrown into disarray when her fiance's free-spirited brother returns home.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: For Sophia's birthday, Dorothy flies her sister Angela in from Sicily, Italy, as a surprise; however, Dorothy's the one who's surprised when Sophia's reaction is that of disgust.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy feels sympathy for Stan when he tells her he's going to have open heart surgery; however, that sympathy fades when she learns of his many infidelities while they were married.
